name: tests-e2e-ng
description: End-to-end tests for Angular application and API

scripts.test:smoke: npx cross-env TEST_CATEGORY=smoke API_PORT=5172 ANGULAR_PORT=4200 DATABASE_PATH=test.db API_URL=http://localhost:5172 ANGULAR_URL=http://localhost:4200 playwright test --config=playwright.config.webserver.ts
scripts.test:critical: npx cross-env TEST_CATEGORY=critical API_PORT=5172 ANGULAR_PORT=4200 DATABASE_PATH=test.db API_URL=http://localhost:5172 ANGULAR_URL=http://localhost:4200 playwright test --config=playwright.config.webserver.ts
scripts.test:extended: npx cross-env TEST_CATEGORY=extended API_PORT=5172 ANGULAR_PORT=4200 DATABASE_PATH=test.db API_URL=http://localhost:5172 ANGULAR_URL=http://localhost:4200 playwright test --config=playwright.config.webserver.ts
scripts.test:webserver: npx cross-env API_PORT=5172 ANGULAR_PORT=4200 DATABASE_PATH=test.db API_URL=http://localhost:5172 ANGULAR_URL=http://localhost:4200 playwright test --config=playwright.config.webserver.ts
scripts.servers:restart: npm run servers:stop && npm run servers:start
